projects.title: This website!
projects.shortDescription:
I built this website from scratch using React and Bulma CSS.

While learning React, I wanted to practice my skills and make a real-world project that I could actually benefit from.

projects.title: Automation of Document Processing with RPA
projects.shortDescription: See how I automated a routine service bureau operation and how our customer benefits from this solution.

projects.title: Customer Payment Orders Automation
projects.shortDescription: We helped our customer to automate their workflow. The daily volume of the process was consisting of 5000 cases.

projects.title: My Master Thesis
projects.shortDescription: I built an educational virtual reality application in Unity Game Engine. The aim of my thesis was to find whether if it is possible to use virtual reality as a supplementary tool in lessons.

projects.title: Smart House (IoT)
projects.shortDescription:
In this group project, we offer a consumer-related Smart House solution along with a prototype.

We used Particle Photon as the IoT interface and developed a mobile application for users to remotely control smart objects at their home.

projects.title: Picky - The Dietary Preference Bot
projects.shortDescription: In this group project, we used Google Dialogflow, Google Firebase and Facebook for Developers to create a chatbot that can help users decide what they want to eat.

projects.title: Visual Analytics
projects.shortDescription:
In this exam project, I created a dashboard from a big dataset.

The purpose of the project was to identify and to choose the appropriate principles, methods, tools and techniques for a given dataset to create a meaningful and actionable information dashboard.
